title: Home Widget for HomeKit updated with support for cameras, sensor battery level, more
content:
As we previously covered on 9to5Mac, Home Widget for HomeKit is a powerful iOS app that enhances your experience with HomeKit-enabled accessories – and now it’s even better. The latest version of the app, which was released on Wednesday, adds support for cameras, sensors battery level, thermostats, and more.

more…

The post Home Widget for HomeKit updated with support for cameras, sensor battery level, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Home Widget for HomeKit was updated with even more features, including support for cameras, sensor battery level, and more.
